stanza.line: Lo as a careful huswife runs to (a)catch(/a)
One of her feathered creatures broke (b)away(/b)
Sets down her babe and makes all swift (a)dispatch(/a)
In pursuit of the thing she would have (b)stay(/b)
Whilst her neglected child holds her in (c)chase(/c)
Cries to catch her whose busy care is (d)bent(/d)
To follow that which flies before her (c)face(/c)
So run'st thou after that which flies from (e)thee(/e)
Whilst I thy babe chase thee afar (f)behind(/f)
But if thou catch thy hope turn back to (e)me(/e)
And play the mother's part kiss me be (f)kind(/f)
So will I pray that thou mayst have thy (g)Will(/g)
If thou turn back and my loud crying (g)still(/g)
